items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: TodoApp is a lightweight, interactive to-do list application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project serves as a practical example for mastering key front-end development concepts such as event handling, state management, and data persistence using localStorage.
items.title: geggenpress4231/todo: TodoApp is a lightweight, interactive to-do list application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project serves as a practical example for mastering key front-end development concepts such as event handling, state management, and data persistence using localStorage.
